learning.title: Docker Introspection Scripts Location
learning.problem: Need to identify and use existing Docker log introspection tools
learning.solution: Existing Docker introspection scripts are located at: - scripts/docker_log_introspection.py - Main introspection tool for analyzing Docker container logs - scripts/docker_compose_log_introspector.py - Docker Compose specific log introspection

implementation.usage: python scripts/docker_log_introspection.py [hours_back] [target_service] # Default: 24 hours, backend service # Returns exit code 2 if errors found needing remediation
implementation.features: - Categorizes errors by type (database, auth, config, etc.) - Prioritizes errors by severity and frequency - Generates JSON report with top issues - Provides context around errors

learning.outcome: Use existing introspection tools instead of creating new ones. Script provides prioritized error list for systematic remediation.
